# Calvia.app

> Calvia.app is The Modern Yellow Pages of Mallorca's Southwest. It helps residents and visitors discover trusted local businesses, offers, events, and premium booking access.

## Core Pages
- [Home](https://calvia.app/home)
- [Discover](https://calvia.app/discover)
- [Bookings](https://calvia.app/bookings)
- [Deals](https://calvia.app/deals)
- [Events](https://calvia.app/events)
- [Profile](https://calvia.app/profile)
- [Partner Dashboard](https://calvia.app/partners)
- [Partner Support](https://calvia.app/partners/support)
- [Privacy](https://calvia.app/privacy)
- [Terms](https://calvia.app/terms)

## Crawl Files
- [Sitemap](https://calvia.app/sitemap.xml)
- [Robots](https://calvia.app/robots.txt)
- [LLM](https://calvia.app/llm.txt)
